title: Play and Pause Button
description: In Part 2 of the Sound with p5.js series, I show you how to add a button to the DOM capable of playing and stopping the playback of a sound file.

timestamps.title: There must be a reference to the p5.Sound library
Add a button to start/stop song
Write a function that will control the playback of the song

codeExamples.title: Play and Pause Button
codeExamples.description: This sketch shows how to add a button to the DOM capable of playing and stopping the playback of a sound file.

links.title: p5.sound library
links.description: p5.js reference for the sound library

links.title: Just Like a Rainbow by the Columbians
